text:
How Trump has made America great again requires a great deal of contemplation of how it was previously great before it elected a Kenyan president who was born in Hawaii. Back in the day before Obama was elected,  American men were wont to engaging in raucous catcalls to women as they made their way down public sidewalks, spontaneous kissing of women by men as they  stepped off the subway.  Yanking at a woman’s bra as she stood on a bus was quite the norm and few women even minded an occasional pinch of their titties by well-intended men who were just seeking a little fun.  And grabbing a woman’s pussy was merely the most casual and expected exploit of American women that one could imagine. It was a time when women loved the attention of the catcalls, the loosening of her bra by a stranger, the pinching of her titties after a long day of fighting off her horny boss during her lunchtime and the sheer delight of getting her pussy grabbed by anyone daring enough to do it. It truly was the greatest time that America ever knew. 
Sadly …America elected a Kenyan who was born in Hawaii who surely must have cheated in getting into America’s Ivy League schools (Columbia &  Harvard). His socialist agenda of securing healthcare for America’s poorest and most vulnerable citizens must have been an idea that came straight from Marx, Lenin, and Stalin who were simply social marvels when it came to addressing the social needs of their respective nation’s poorest citizens. It’s such a shame that a Hawaiian born Kenyan could stoop so low to steal the ideals of his own social agenda from the world’s most “ well-intended” tyrants. Obama’s socialism was so destructive that it stole America’s most passionate pastimes of catcalling, friendly stranger kissing, bra stretching, frivolous titty pinching, and the casual and carefree exploitation of pussy grabbing. Obama’s evil reign of power yielded America nothing more than the loathesome…”Me Too” movement  which has sought to utterly destroy those great days of male dominance in America…particularly for America’s most sensitive citizens: White Males.
Now Trump is reviving all of America’s favorite pastimes and is working mightily on an unexpected comeback for its most sensitive citizens. With catcalling, random kissing of women by perfect strangers,  bra tugging,  titty pinching and pussy grabbing, America is destined to return to the great America it once was before the Ivy League educated Hawaiian born Kenyan made such a powerful effort to make America think again by asking our most sensitive Americans to eschew America’s favorite pastimes. Now we’re back to our unbridled freedoms of unlimited catcalling, random street kissing, bra tugging, titty pinching and pussy grabbing. What American would not want such pastimes??  See all the wonderfulness in our 45th president. His sheer wonderfulness simply makes me cry. Somebody pass me another Kleenex. The idea that America has returned to her glory days of pussy grabbing always makes me cry.

text:
In a real democracy, elected and appointed officials are accountable. Not in the US. There you have an impotent and corrupt Congress that is rigid with indecision. In the rest of the world, countries no longer trust the US and they are steadily disengaging, sidelining the US in world affairs. It has become riven with illegal militias and agencies conducting war and violence against individuals simply because they deny they oppose US influence. In the most important region in the 21st century, Asia, the US is being sidelined and its military and intelligence bases are being closed by hosting countries as they realise that they are a threat to their own security.
After the UK, the worlds most staunch ally of the US since WW2 has been Australia. Now that country is putting the squeeze on the many highly secret installations that past governments have allowed the US to operate there, and which are now a political liability for their government. The CIA and NSA may be short of a home in the region before too long, which would black out their surveillance and operations in Asia. 
Of course, none of this gets widely reported, specially back home in the US, where it seems that the entire populations suffers under the delusion that the US is the bastion of freedom. Nothing could be further from the truth.
author: Stephen in OZ

text:
Doing impeachment based on what you have now is just as incompetent and mean and hateful as the traitor president is. These things have a proper path. Investigate the book of charges. Then you shift over to a bill of impeachment and then you procedural  vote. Then the Republicans will be childish scum and not even take it up. 

But don’t worry Trump by attempting to stop all investigations and oversight of the government with the turning over of his taxes,  has given us an easy path to impeach him if you really wanted. That is simple black letter law passed to check the president and is 30+ years old. Allowing even the Democrats to bring impeachment charges up immediately if they liked on violation of a felony federal law (and closely tied to three or four clauses in the constitution ) directly pertaining to the office of the president and his staff. 

They don’t
